title: Financial Goals
description: An app for informed financial decisions: manage balances, track transactions, and set goals.
bullets: Programmed a single-page web application with streamlined navigation by applying fundamental React and React Router patterns
Developed a lightweight interactive interface for React to visualize goal progress bar
Researched solutions and implemented a 3rd party library to achieve accurate floating-point calculations
Leveraged Chrome/React Devtools and strategic console statements to monitor app state and methodically debug errors, leading to improved stability

title: Movie Social
description: A movie library app with search, save, rate, and review films.
bullets: Incorporated an extensive RESTful API, enabling efficient partial title searches for a vast movie and TV show database
Incorporated full CRUD capabilities in Sinatra back-end to handle data requests resulting in seamless data management
Implemented Semantic-UI React, providing a quick solution for consistent design to expedite development time

title: It's a Date
description: An app for users to create and store fun activities to turn into date nights.
bullets: Boosted React app's stability and scalability by optimizing with Recoil, reducing component dependencies
Employed Bcrypt hashing on the back-end and authentication routes on the front-end to ensure user privacy
Built back-end with full CRUD capabilities and validations in Ruby on Rails, increasing data management and data integrity throughout the application

title: Friends of Grace
description: A CRM tool to help a user keep track of friends, and contact information.
bullets: Implemented user authentication, registration, and session management utilizing the Devise Gem
Executed deployment through Render with PostgreSQL configuration
Created a full-stack Ruby/Ruby on Rails app with robust CRUD scaffolding, partials, and associations
Enhanced user experience and intuitiveness by applying Bootstrap for app styling

title: Portfolio/My Website
bullets: Built a scalable codebase utilizing a monorepo setup in order to modularize functionality via library design
Created an efficient developer experience by extending best-in-class tooling, component libraries, and frameworks
Achieved rapid and continuous deployment with a fully integrated CI/CD workflow to ensure consistent code standards and high software quality
